hero.title: Education as a common
hero.description: Develop your skillset, expand your network and earn cryptocurrency by immersing yourself in a Koios World

article.title: About Koios
article.description: Koios aims to become a decentralized learning platform, empowering learners, tutors, content creators & job providers to participate in an open learning environment. Koios is open-source, has no entry barriers and is available for all. Education as a common. Why? Because education is the most powerful tool to change the world.

article.title: Koios DAO
article.description: Koios aims to be fully owned and operated by its community as a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO). Koios will be governed via a democratic and transparent voting system which allows all stakeholders to get involved and shape Koiosâ€™s future.
